question: Ed had 24 more marbles than Doug. Doug lost 27 of his marbles at the playground while Ed found 9 more marbles. How many more marbles did Ed have than Doug then?
response:
Ed had 24 more marbles than Doug initially.
Doug lost 27 marbles, so he now has 24 marbles less than Ed.
Ed found 9 more marbles, so he now has 33 more marbles than Doug.
The answer is 33.
